Name: Wau
Review Text: This new restaurant is quite charming. I loved their outdoor seating area and their indoor dining area is cute too. We started off with the Bubble Trouble and Api-Api cocktails. Both very good. I loved the mango pearls in the sake cocktail â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: Came for weeknight dinner on a holiday with a reservation. Itâ€™s a quaint and cozy place with a heated outdoor patio. Cocktails were unique and dishes were good. Overall, it was a nice experience and will come back when in the mood.

Name: Wau
Review Text: Reply great food! Loved the appetizers here. We got the savory donuts and roti canai. Also got the nasi lemak which is a classic and that was delicious as well. The salty egg noodles were very interesting but good! The lobster was a bit â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: I've been wanting to try this place out for the longest time but was always super busy with work!!! I finally had the chance to stop by WAU with my mom. We loved everything! 10/10 would recommend :) The laksa was so flavorful and the drinks are strong which we loved

Name: Wau
Review Text: Do yourself a favor and visit this lovely restaurant in  Amsterdam Ave.The service is unmatched. The staff truly cares about your experience. The food is absolutely amazing â€“ everything we tasted melted in our mouths. Absolutely the best â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: Thank you so much for this great experience, guys! I and Victoria enjoyed a beautiful dinner trying out Malaysian cuisine. It was our first time eating authentic south Asian food, all dishes were  so delicious! Great place with beautiful â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: Donâ€™t order Roasted Hainanese Chicken Rice, itâ€™s dry. And roasted. If youâ€™re gonna remix a classic dish, it better be amazing. Itâ€™s not. The Nasi Goreng was just ok. Itâ€™s pricey for what it is, average.

Name: Wau
Review Text: Absolutely delighted that a Malaysian place has opened up in UWS. Tried the Roti Kanai, Murtabak for appetizers. Both were amazing. Next we tried Nasi Biryani with lamb which was okay. The lamb was well cooked but the Biryani needed more â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: In the heart of upper east side. Corner spot stood out , with its outdoor setup and its rustic look. Walking in , it was dim and romantic with suede green chairs. Totally loved the ambiance of the locations. Now on to the food , we ordered â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: Beautiful interior design and most importantly, phenomenal food. Much needed addition to the UWS dining scene. Great spot for a night out with friends, (they have amazing cocktails!) or with the whole family. Kids friendly!

Name: Wau
Review Text:
The two stars were earned by this candy (see pic) for it's delish sweet and sour flavor.
We were a party of 4, a round of cocktails, 4 apps and 4 mains all shared. Not â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: Malaysian smartly catered to Upper West Side taste. Not hawker prices, but nice decor, definitely recommend it. Good service.

Name: Wau
Review Text: Reservations highly recommended. First restaurant checked vaccine and ID for indoor seating. We had crispy lotus root , mango salad and chicken tom yum soup ! Absolutely delicious! Service was good! Bartender had cool head glasses. â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: I had an awesome experience dining at WAU. Right as I entered I loved the vibe of this restaurant, small cozy vibe with a twist of Malaysian aroma in the air. The staff were super friendly and welcoming. Food was cooked to perfection. I can't wait to come here again with friends.

Name: Wau
Review Text: Amazing dinner for 7 - all delicious and perfect for sharing. Warm environment, gracious team - they made my birthday extra special. Love Malaysian food - this did not disappoint!

Name: Wau
Review Text:
What works well: service is very kind; food is fun; decor is lovely.
Suggestions: more modern and quieter music, maybe Southeast Asian music, either traditional or modern; donâ€™t promise booth then take it away for the reason that â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: Ordered drunken noodles for takeout but gave me pad see ew instead. Flavor is okay but over-priced.

Name: Wau
Review Text: I have never written a bad review but I have no choice but to write one after how the staff made us feel. Staff was extremely rude to us. We were there for a dinner reservation at 8 30. From the moment we walked in, they kept rushing us to â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: I decided to try the Singapore Laksa because I've read so many amazing reviews about it. Let me tell YOU! It tasted so so good. I recommend everyone to try out this dish!

Name: Wau
Review Text: Had dinner here and we were all impressed by the food. Rendang beef, pork belly and Chilean seabass were all very good.

Name: Wau
Review Text: Iâ€™ve tried this restaurant 3 times. One at lunch, one for dinner and one takeout. Each time had a hit or miss element, I think theyâ€™re still getting their kinks worked out. And probably have some staffing improvements. â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: The menu is beautifully diverse in terms of south Asian food options. The flavors and spices were all there in authentic form. It was such a great experience.

Name: Wau
Review Text: Excellent new addition to the Upper Westside restaurant scene.   Unique Asian dishes, including noodle, soup, and rice dishes.  Fresh ingredients, great flavors.   Friendly staff and a cool atmosphere inside.  Great bar.

Name: Wau
Review Text: I really don't get all the hype around this place. Firstly, the service was horrendous. After ordering we were approached by a different waiter asking to take our order, unaware anyone had already been waiting on us. The first waiter came â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: Visited on a friday night w/o a reservation and was offered bar seating. Canâ€™t speak to the cocktails (but i would go back just to have a drink-they look amazing). Ordered the Nasi Goreng & Rendang beef and enjoyed both, Portions were satisfying too. Definitely will try again.

Name: Wau
Review Text: I had an amazing experience with them, one of the best Malaysian cuisines I've tried! The Soy Sauce Braised Pork Belly melted perfeclty in my tastebuds! Can't wait to bring my friends here.

Name: Wau
Review Text: So excited to have a Malaysian restaurant in the neighbourhood! We had roti canai, wonton dumplings, char kueh teow and nasi lemak. I think the nasi could have been more lemak but otherwise I felt the food was great and authentic. We will be back!

Name: Wau
Review Text: Amazing first experience. My boyfriend and I couldn't figure out what we wanted to eat for lunch today, so we searched for restaurants near me, I saw WAU and the dishes sounded so delicious. We had to go in and try it out for ourselves.10/10 reccommend!!

Name: Wau
Review Text: Delicious Malaysian food. Highly remmended. The Nasi Lemak was delicious. Malaysian cuisine is its own fusion style -- think Indian meets Chinese meets Thai. If you haven't had it you're missing out.

Name: Wau
Review Text: For appetizer, we shared the roti canai (the roti itself was nice and chewy, and the curry had great flavor).The cocktails (we got the Bubble Trouble and the Kaya Killer) were unique and quite easy to drink. The Kaya Killer is a bit â€¦

Name: Wau
Review Text: This was an amazing dinner! The coconut was was surprisingly so amazing! Can't wait to go back.

Name: Wau
Review Text: This place was disappointing. The lotus roots were delicious but the Rendang beef was kind of bitter and a little spicy. No other flavor. Same with the murtabak. Not much flavor. And itâ€™s all just too expensive

Name: Wau
Review Text: I don't usually try new foods, but my friend recommended that I come here and try it out because she said the food tasted amazing! And guess what?! She was right! It tasted fantastic.

Name: Wau
Review Text: I rarely write reviews but I had to after visiting WAU! Food was fantastic here, I would like to bring my parents next time to try because they love Maylasian cuisine. Give this place a try!

Name: Wau
Review Text: I've eaten everywhere UWS. Wau is an awesome edition to the options available. I highly suggest you just order something you have never heard of before. Everything is an explosion of flavor. You won't be sorry!

Name: Wau
Review Text: Great choice, amazing booths, cocktails and friendly staff. - THE LAKSA IS BOMB

Name: Wau
Review Text: Highly recommend this place! They may be on the newer end, but they donâ€™t disappoint! The waiters and servers were super attentive and sweet. Food tasted immaculate!

Name: Wau
Review Text: Wau WOW! Everything was delicious. We had the crab donuts, roti, nasi lemak, and hawker noodles.

Name: Wau
Review Text: Terrific service, great food, and fun atmosphere. I'm very impressed how efficient everything was run given it's so new. Will definitely recommend to my friends!

Name: Wau
Review Text: My friend recommended me to try this place because she came with her parents. I am so glad I tried WAU out because it definitely did not disappoint!

Name: Wau
Review Text: Wau, these flavors!

Name: Wau
Review Text: My wife and I were very exited to order some authentic Singaporean food. We spent 120$â€¦ Half of the food was cold and we did not get any rice. When we tried to call the restaurant we could not get a hold of anybody.

Name: Wau
Review Text:
I came in from Texas and I saw this place on a top new restaurants list.

Food came out swiftly and it was really delicious.

Name: Wau
Review Text: Noodles were very bland. Beef rendang was ok though but overall experience underwhelming

Review Text: Delicious noodles and beautiful drinks ðŸ¥°

Name: Wau
Review Text: Great food, interesting drink selection, fantastic service. I would go again to try the rest of the menu.

Name: Wau
Review Text: If you like good southeast Asian food, I'm sorry but you have to go somewhere else. "WAU"? More like, meh.

Name: Wau
Review Text: Excellent selection of Pan Asian dishes. Highly recommended!

Name: Wau
Review Text: The Indonesian fried rice is amazing. Highly recommend it.
